ValidationRule.description: Sales, implementation and solutions cannot assign leads back to Leads user.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( Owner:User.LastName = "Leads", ISCHANGED(OwnerId),
OR( ISPICKVAL(Status,"Marketing 3: Marketing Qualified"), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Sales 1: Not Contacted yet"), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Sales 2: Prospecting"), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Sales 3a: Not appropriate contact"), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Sales 3b: Contact Identified"), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Sales 4a: Interested"), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Sales 4b: Not Interested"), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Sales 5: Unresponsive"), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Sales Qualified"), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Sales Nurture")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Active leads cannot be assigned to Leads. Please follow up with this lead or set the status to Sales Nurture.
